website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight option features good cork and can be hung vertically or horizontally.
pros: Good quality cork on one half, with a magnetic dry erase white board on the other half
Includes an accessory kit, hanging hardware, and a marker tray that can attach to any edge so you can hang it vertically or horizontally
cons: Some of these arrived with rough patches on the white board side
Reports that the markers don't wipe off the dry erase side completely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use in his dorm room. He loves it. We hung it with Command strips (the heaviest ones I could find -- for 16 lb pictures). The board isn't that heavy, and the strips are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax18

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time, perfect for what I needed. It's light enough to use command strips to hang. I used the velcro strips. So far, it's still up, but only been about a week. The cork is as thick as I had hoped it would be, push pins go in pretty deep. Also, the dry erase markers are showing up well on the board. The clip on tray is holding the markers well. Happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Monica M

customer_reviews.title: Great cork/dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: This cork/dry erase board is great. Fits perfectly in the space I needed. I had to order it twice because the first one I received was a little bent but the replacement is perfect. I used large Velcro command strips to attach it to the wall instead of drilling holes. Similar ones from staples do not have equal cork and dry erase space, so this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The protection ruined it
customer_reviews.text: The board itself seems fine for its purpose... except it came with protective wrap on the white board that needed to be removed. It's nearly impossible to remove every bit of the plastic so it leaves an ugly trace behind as well as my board came with a few little bits of cork board already crumbling off so for this price, I would hope it would be better to look at in my office every day
customer_reviews.author: Carin Maddux

customer_reviews.title: White Board Side Doesn't Erase Well
customer_reviews.text: The marker board doesn't work well with my dry erase markers, even with white board cleaner you can still see a haze of the marker. I ended up purchasing markers in a lighter shade to help eliminate the issue, it's still present, but not as bad. The cork board side is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erica C. NY

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered this for my dad who has dementia to help remind him of appointments, schedules, birthdays etc.. and love the dry erase/ cork board, but accidently ordered the wrong size. It wouldn't fit anywhere on Dad's walls. The seller is sending me the size I need and told me to keep the one I already have since my husband had thrown away the box it came in. Definitely recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can be turned with cork right or left side. Cork is not cheap/thin. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with organization
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the combo board for my mom’s home office. She said she enjoys it because it has dual purpose: she can write ideas/notes on the dry erase side and she can posts notes or important events on the cork side. I think it also helps keeps important things in one area.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the home office or the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Some things do not need holes in them. The magnet side handles that.
customer_reviews.author: B Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great product is and does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Great product is and does what it says. Its also a great size board. Worked really well for our home. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be quite good. Comes with everything you need to get started. Directions say to drill holes a certain size (don't have the directions with me now) but that is incorrect. Drill them much smaller. We had to substitute bigger anchors to get it hung. Otherwise pleased with the product so far although it hasn't been used yet!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. Product is great but came damaged. When she received it the box was fine from shipping. Golf ball size dent in dry erase board. In another area of the dry erase board it’s missing the white finish. Part of the cork board on top is missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Weygand

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors who forget.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a senior who forgets. I post his activity sheet on the cork side and write any appointments and "things to do" every am for him.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Helps me stay real organized and comes with what you need to hang it up and start putting things up! I would recommend buying more push pins and maybe some stronger magnets if you’re putting up some heavier stuff! Also make sure you put up the pen holder before fastening it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Butler

customer_reviews.title: Item is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I disliked. I particularly liked the size...big enough to accomodate the information I wanted to display and small enough to go in the space I had in a small condo kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Balt12

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bulletin board. It looks great in my home office. It was really easy to hang up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works great, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: We used Command damage free strips to attach the board and it works great for my daughter who is in middle school. I recommend this board, it's quality is very good, we like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Yana Khmelnik

customer_reviews.title: Dry out markers
customer_reviews.text: The board is fine but the markers are all dry out. Got two of them and they are the same situation
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamoroll

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you want a rip-off product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible quality. Came with a bunch of dents on the outside. Amazon keeps giving me an error when I try to do a return. For the price I expected a little bit more better quality. Will not be being anything from this seller and definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Galan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters school papers to pin up and calendar for her chores.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut824

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: The bulletin board was the perfect addition to my five years old room. Every aspect was excellent. This makes the third one I bought for my grandkids. A good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Bolter

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made! Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made! The cork board AND the whiteboard are both separating from the base straight out of the box. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the size it is. Works Perfect in my home office. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: William R. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This board came exactly as described. It was packaged well and secure. I believe it will look great once hung.
customer_reviews.author: Annette D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great board. delivered immediately. My daughter is very happy and getting a lot of work done.
customer_reviews.author: TONYVELEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fair price, markers and eraser included!
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price. One of the screws stripped during installation, but no big deal (used a screw I had on hand).
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product at all. The markers hardly write and the eraser hardly erases. This entire set screams cheap!
customer_reviews.author: BreLeigh Stragand

customer_reviews.title: Still see writing after using eraser.
customer_reviews.text: I did read from an earlier post before I bought this that it leaves streaks or you can still see writing even after erasing everything. I plan to buy some erase spray and try using paper towels. I’ll update this post later.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Abbe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The white board is lifted away from the board itself upon unboxing it. I immediately tried to return it but its not elegable for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: And now my husband can stay organized in his office, and we can leave reminders/notes for each other.
customer_reviews.author: michalthegirl

customer_reviews.title: Add Markers to Your Order
customer_reviews.text: The included dry-erase markers are absolute garbage. Out of the package, they simply don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, it went up easily, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: pcg206

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It was as described and actually larger than what I wanted but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: maiplia559

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard/bulletin board is perfect for the space above my son's new computer desk. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: skymaster

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Board arrived slightly bent. Plastic wall anchors included with the board were of poor quality and did not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love my board! Everything that is pictured, came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my Aunt. Just the right size. All the right stuff. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sam the Small Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great size, very easy to get on wall. Hate the markers and eraser it came with though.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Makor

customer_reviews.title: OK board, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product came with scratch on whiteboard, bad packaging Plastic on the corners became slightly undone when mounting on wall, expected higher quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: phillip crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, very nice and well built.
customer_reviews.text: I liked every thing about the board and it works perfect for me keeping count daily at my job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Was easy to hang; I used Command strips. Arrived in a timely manner. Really great tool to help get organized!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Board has rough patches and hence not erasable
customer_reviews.text: For the price ($50) I expected this board to be free from a major defect, such as being free of rough patches. A whiteboard should be smooth. See attached photo. My child drew around the area for clarity: there is one big rough patch (1.5" in diameter) and the marker drawing is permanently there, and along side it, there are other rough patches that even tiny dots are not erasable. The packaging was intact, the styrofoam as well. The rough patch does not look like it was damaged from shipping but a defect in the product. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: ABanana

customer_reviews.title: Unless you don’t care about the cork board then go ahead buy it !! 🤬
customer_reviews.text: I liked the dry erase, no problem there ! But the cork board is a joke, can’t push a tack into it without using a hammer 📌🔨!!️
customer_reviews.author: Brendap

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for keeping track of notes and calendar
customer_reviews.text: Fits my space perfectly. I keep my calendar pinned to cork and write reminders using dry erase markers
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hagins

product_meta.title: Magnetic Dry Erase and Cork Combo Board: 24x36, Aluminum Frame with 4 Markers, 4 Magnets, 10 Push Pins, 1 Eraser, Marker Tray & Hanging Hardware Included
product_meta.description: Magnetic Dry Erase/Cork Board Combo Board
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC Dry Erase & Cork Board Combo
4 MARKERS / 10 PUSH PINS / 4 MAGNETS / ERASER / MARKER TRAY / HANGING HARDWARE
PREMIUM cork grain will help hide pin holes
NO ROUGH EDGES - Plastic Corner Cover provide a clean look.
GUARANTEED QUALITY - Ships and Services by Amazon with Prime available & A-Z money back guarantee.High quality aluminum is BUILT TO LAST

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
